reviews.text: Very clean! With helpful staff. I don't get why people get angry at not being able to stand on the platform when they are clearly cleaning the trains as they come in !  Good job northern

The staff are always friendly and helpful here,  but the guard on the train this morning was extra helpful to everyone who was changing trains,  advising them as he checked their tickets which platform to get the connection from.

Went through this Blackpool train station yesterday. It's definitely one of the poorer layouts I've seen. Getting out wasn't too bad but getting back in later that day sure was. Firstly, they don't let you into the platforms until the train is actually there so you have huge queues at the platform doors which cross over the ticket barriers making it hard for people to get out of there. They really should have had the ticket barriers on the gates so that people can go onto the platforms whenever they want. Secondly, the ticket barriers didn't seem to be working for some people when I passed through them.
The old north station excursion platforms, desperately needs updating from the 60s. Staff however are great
It's a spacious clean train station. Plenty of people on hand to answer any questions. The only downside was the fact the disabled toilet was out of order when I last visited.
